import React, {useState } from 'react'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; const EditAccountPage = ({ user }) => { const [account, setAccount] = useState({ firstName: user.firstName, surname: user.surname, location: user.location, education: user.education, workExperience: user.workExperience, skills: user.skills, salary: user.salary, jobType: user.jobType }); const [navigate, setNavigate] = useState(false); const edit = async () => { const result = await fetch('/api/seekers/edit', { method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify(account), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } }); setNavigate(true); } const handleChange = (event) => { const accountCopy = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(account)); accountCopy[event.target.name] = event.target.value; setAccount(accountCopy); } if (navigate) { return ; } return ( <>

Edit Account
